com.horaz.client.widgets
Class Page

java.lang.Object
  com.horaz.client.widgets.BaseWidget<com.google.gwt.dom.client.Element>
      com.horaz.client.widgets.Page

public class Page
extends BaseWidget<com.google.gwt.dom.client.Element>

Coming from jquery mobile, in Horaz you define your different UIs in so called Pages (similar to Activity in Android). Dialogs are simply subclasses of Page, and so you use them in the same way.

HTML Tag:
<div data-role="page"> or <div data-role="dialog">
